00053 typedef struct rt_buffer {
00054 
00055         unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00056 
00057         xnsynch_t isynch_base;  /* !< Base synchronization object -- input side. */
00058         xnsynch_t osynch_base;  /* !< Base synchronization object -- output side. */
00059         xnhandle_t handle;      /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00060         char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* !< Symbolic name. */
00061 
00062         int mode;               /* !< Creation mode. */
00063         off_t rdoff;            /* !< Read offset. */
00064         off_t wroff;            /* !< Write offset. */
00065         size_t fillsz;          /* !< Filled space. */
00066 
00067         u_long wrtoken;         /* !< Write token. */
00068         u_long rdtoken;         /* !< Read token. */
00069 
00070         size_t bufsz;           /* !< Buffer size. */
00071         caddr_t bufmem;         /* !< Buffer space. */
00072 
00073 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
00074         pid_t cpid;                     /* !< Creator's pid. */
00075 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00076         xnholder_t rlink;               /* !< Link in resource queue. */
00077 #define rlink2buffer(ln)        container_of(ln, RT_BUFFER, rlink)
00078         xnqueue_t *rqueue;              /* !< Backpointer to resource queue. */
00079 
00080 } RT_BUFFER;
